message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "This report utilizes data from the Global Findex and the World Bank Enterprise Surveys to analyze patterns of financial inclusion among women entrepreneurs in Sub-Saharan Africa.", "dataset": ["Global Findex", "World Bank Enterprise Surveys"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion", "Gender"]}, {"sentence": "Using a panel dataset from Indonesia, which combines household socioeconomic data with detailed information on bank holding companies and their subsidiaries, this paper examines the impact of bank ownership and competition on credit supply and firm performance.", "dataset": ["panel dataset from Indonesia"], "topic": ["Financial Sector"]}, {"sentence": "We used a combination of clinical, demographic, and neuroimaging data from the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) and the Australian Imaging, Biomarkers & Lifestyle Flagship Study of Ageing (AIBL) to develop and validate an algorithm for predicting progression from mild cognitive impairment to Alzheimer's disease.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)", "Australian Imaging, Biomarkers & Lifestyle Flagship Study of Ageing (AIBL)"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This study analyzes the relationship between climate variability and food security using time series data from the World Data Centre for Climate and NASA's Gravity Recovery and Climate Experiment (GRACE).", "dataset": ["World Data Centre for Climate", "NASA's Gravity Recovery and Climate Experiment (GRACE)"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "Using a sample of manufacturing firms in Pakistan, we examine the effect of the introduction of non-tariff measures (NTMs) by India on Pakistani exports, drawing from both trade flow data and qualitative assessments of the severity of NTMs using the Global Trade Alert database.", "dataset": ["sample of manufacturing firms in Pakistan", "trade flow data", "Global Trade Alert database"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "We combine household survey data from the Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture in Ethiopia, Malawi, Tanzania, and Uganda with satellite-derived weather data from NASA's Tropical Rainfall Measuring Mission (TRMM) to examine the impact of precipitation shocks on agricultural productivity and dietary diversity.", "dataset": ["Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture", "NASA's Tropical Rainfall Measuring Mission (TRMM)"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food", "Environment"]}, {"sentence": "Using a unique dataset of garment factories in Bangladesh that combines production line-based measures of productivity with detailed production network information, this paper studies the role of buyer relationships on factory performance.", "dataset": ["dataset of garment factories in Bangladesh"], "topic": ["Jobs & Development"]}, {"sentence": "This study examines how disasters affect poverty dynamics in the Philippines using panel data from the Philippine Statistics Authority's Family Income and Expenditure Survey and hazard data from the International Disaster Database.", "dataset": ["Philippine Statistics Authority's Family Income and Expenditure Survey", "International Disaster Database"], "topic": ["Disaster Risk Management", "Poverty"]}, {"sentence": "We use data from the World Bank's Enterprise Surveys to study the relationship between corporate governance structure and firm performance across countries in the Middle East and North Africa region.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Enterprise Surveys"], "topic": ["Governance"]}, {"sentence": "This report assesses the impacts of air pollution on public health in China using data from the Chinese National Health Surveillance System and the US Embassy's air quality monitoring program.", "dataset": ["Chinese National Health Surveillance System", "US Embassy's air quality monitoring program"], "topic": ["Health", "Environment"]}]
